ARABIC: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ رَبِّى وَرَبُّكُمْ فَٱعْبُدُوهُ هَٰذَا صِرَٰطٌ مُّسْتَقِيمٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Allah is my Lord and your Lord so worship Him. That is a straight path.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Surely God is my Lord, and your Lord, so worship Him; and this is the right path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely, Allah is my Lord and your Lord; so serve Him alone. This is the straight way.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God is my Lord as well as yours. Worship Him for this is the right path."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: ‘Undoubtedly Allah is the Lord of all – mine and yours – so worship Him only; this is the Straight Path.’”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Truly, Allah is my Lord and your Lord, so worship Him (Alone). This is the straight path."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely Allah is my Lord and your Lord, therefore serve Him; this is the right path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely God is my Lord and your Lord; so serve Him. This is a straight path".'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! Allah is my Lord and your Lord, so worship Him. That is a straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: God is my Lord and your Lord, so worship Him. That is the straight path."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily Allah is my Lord; and your Lord, wherefore worship Him; this is the straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed Allah is my Lord and your Lord; so worship Him. This is a straight path.” ’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: It is Allah Who is my Lord and your Lord; then worship Him. This is a Way that is straight.'"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Truly! Allah is my Lord and your Lord, so worship Him (Alone). This is the Straight Path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Allah is my Lord and your Lord, therefore, worship Him. This is the Straight Path"'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “God is my Lord and your Lord, so worship Him. That is a straight path.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, Allah is my Lord and your Lord, so worship Him. That is the straight path."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [3:51] Surely God is my Lord and your Lord, so worship Him. This, that which I enjoin upon you, is a straight path’. But they rejected him and did not believe in him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! Allah is my Lord and your Lord, so worship Him) declare his divine Oneness. (That) divine Oneness (is a straight path) an established religion, Islam, which He is pleased with.
